de.szut.dqi12.cheftrainer.server.databasecommunication

Class CommunityManagement

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.szut.dqi12.cheftrainer.server.databasecommunication.CommunityManagement

  • public class CommunityManagement
extends java.lang.Object
    This class is used to communicate with the database. It has Querys for the topic "Community"
    Author:
    Alexander Brennecke

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      CommunityManagement(SQLConnection sqlCon)
      Constructor.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean createNewCommunity(java.lang.String name, java.lang.String password, int adminID)
      This method is used to create a new community in the database, when there is no database with the given name.
      boolean createNewManager(java.lang.String communityName, int userID)
      This method is called, when a new manager should be added to the database.
      CommunityAutenticationAckMessage enterCommunity(java.lang.String communityName, java.lang.String communityPassword, int userID)
      This method is called, when a user tries to enter an existing community.
      java.util.List<java.lang.Integer> getAllManagerIDs()
      This function collects all Manager IDs from the Database.
      Community getCommunity(int communityID)
      Creates a Community Object for the given community ID with all information, that could be collect in the database.
      java.util.List<java.lang.Integer> getCommunityIDsForUser(int userID)
      This method fetches all CommunityIDs from the database, in which a User with the given ID has a Manager.
      java.util.List<Community> getCummunities(int userID)
      This method collects all communities for the given userID and returns it.
      java.util.List<Manager> getManagers(int communityID, java.lang.String communityName)
      This method collects all managers, that play in the given Community.
      java.util.List<Player> getTeam(int managerID)
      This method creates a List of Player for the given Manager out of the database values.
      java.util.List<Player> getTeam(java.lang.String userName)
      This function creates a Query to read the ID of a User from the database.
      void updatePlacement()
      This function updates the placement of all Manager in all Community, which are saved in the database.

    • Constructor Detail

      • CommunityManagement

        public CommunityManagement(SQLConnection sqlCon)
        Constructor.
        Parameters:
        sqlCon - the current SQLConnection

    • Method Detail

      • getCummunities

        public java.util.List<Community> getCummunities(int userID)
        This method collects all communities for the given userID and returns it.
        Parameters:
        userID - the ID, of the user, that communities should be returns.
        Returns:
        a list of all communities in which the given user has a manager.

      • getCommunityIDsForUser

        public java.util.List<java.lang.Integer> getCommunityIDsForUser(int userID)
        This method fetches all CommunityIDs from the database, in which a User with the given ID has a Manager.
        Parameters:
        userID - the ID of the User, that CommunityIDs will be returned
        Returns:
        a List of Integer with IDs for Community inside.

      • getCommunity

        public Community getCommunity(int communityID)
        Creates a Community Object for the given community ID with all information, that could be collect in the database.
        Parameters:
        communityID - the ID of the Community, that information should be collect in the database.
        Returns:
        a Community Object for the given community ID

      • getManagers

        public java.util.List<Manager> getManagers(int communityID,
                                           java.lang.String communityName)
        This method collects all managers, that play in the given Community.
        Parameters:
        communityID - the ID of the Community
        communityName - the Name of the Community.
        Returns:
        a List of Manager Objects.

      • createNewCommunity

        public boolean createNewCommunity(java.lang.String name,
                                  java.lang.String password,
                                  int adminID)
        This method is used to create a new community in the database, when there is no database with the given name.
        Parameters:
        name - the name of the new community.
        password - the password of the new community
        adminID - the user ID of the user, that creates the community.
        Returns:
        true = community was created.
        See Also:
        /F0012/

      • enterCommunity

        public CommunityAutenticationAckMessage enterCommunity(java.lang.String communityName,
                                                       java.lang.String communityPassword,
                                                       int userID)
        This method is called, when a user tries to enter an existing community.
        Parameters:
        communityName - the name of the community.
        communityPassword - the md5 password of the community
        userID - the user ID of the user, that wants to join the community.
        Returns:
        a HashMap with booleans, that describes, if the entering was successful.
        See Also:
        and /F0040/

      • createNewManager

        public boolean createNewManager(java.lang.String communityName,
                                int userID)
        This method is called, when a new manager should be added to the database.
        Parameters:
        communityName - the name of the community, which the manager joins.
        userID - the ID of the user, that wants to join the community.
        Returns:
        true = manager was created successful.
        See Also:
        /F0040/

      • getTeam

        public java.util.List<Player> getTeam(java.lang.String userName)
        This function creates a Query to read the ID of a User from the database.
        Parameters:
        userName - the name of the user (login name)
        Returns:
        see getTeam(int managerID)

      • getTeam

        public java.util.List<Player> getTeam(int managerID)
        This method creates a List of Player for the given Manager out of the database values.
        Parameters:
        managerID - the id of the Manager, that team should be fetched from the database.
        Returns:
        a List of Player Objects, which presents the team of the Manager

      • getAllManagerIDs

        public java.util.List<java.lang.Integer> getAllManagerIDs()
        This function collects all Manager IDs from the Database.
        Returns:
        a List of IDs of Managers.

      • updatePlacement

        public void updatePlacement()
        This function updates the placement of all Manager in all Community, which are saved in the database.
